column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////We went here for a birthday
column3: I thought the tapas were very plain.  Nothing was particularly good/bad
column5: seared scallops (good but too small) and the paellas (not too good).  The chicken paella and the paella valenciana probably both should have been skipped.  The shrimp and clam fideua was better
column6: the valencian noodles being the highlight.
